hero.name: I'm
hero.title: Developer
hero.description: Computer Systems Engineer with a Master's in Web Site Direction and Engineering with over 8 years creating efficient digital experiences.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Beyond code and technologies
about.paragraph1: I focus on understanding the business context and transforming those needs into clear, modern, and easy-to-use products. I've collaborated with both companies and freelance clients, always seeking to balance functionality, design, and maintainability.
about.paragraph2: I enjoy working on internal tools and administrative panels that facilitate team work. I'm motivated to create experiences where visual clarity and efficiency become part of everyday life.

experience.title: Work
experience.description1: I led the development of digital platforms and internal tools, coordinating teams and applying best practices with <tech>Laravel 12</tech>, <tech>Livewire 3</tech> and <tech>React</tech>.
experience.description2: I participated in requirements definition and project planning, driving clearer and more efficient processes.
experience.description3: I also developed mobile applications with <tech>Flutter</tech>, integrating administrative functions and notifications.

freelance.title: Freelance Web & Mobile Developer
freelance.description: Independent experience collaborating with companies and clients in the development of platforms, administrative panels, and internal tools. Working on analysis, architecture, construction, and continuous improvements, delivering clear, scalable, and business-oriented solutions.

career.title: Academic
career.description: My academic journey reflects my commitment to excellence and technological innovation

maestria.title: Master's in Web Site Direction and Engineering
maestria.description: Development of competencies in technical leadership, digital architecture, team management, and high-impact web project direction.

certificado.title: Certificate in Digital Project Management
certificado.description: Specialized training in digital project management, agile methodologies, scope definition, and strategic prioritization.

ingenieria.title: Computer Systems Engineering
ingenieria.description: Foundation training in software development, databases, systems analysis, and architecture.
ingenieria.recognition: Recognition for updating the institutional website.

section.title: Featured
section.description: A selection of projects that represent my passion for development and creating unique experiences.

outro.title: Let's work together?
outro.description: If you liked what you saw, I'd be delighted to talk about how we can create something amazing together.

page.title: All
page.description: A complete collection of projects demonstrating my experience in web development, mobile applications, and innovative digital solutions.
page.noResults: No projects found in this category

workProcess.title: Work
workProcess.description: This is how I structure each project: clarity in the process, defined services, and an approach that ensures real results.

how.title: How I work
how.description: A structured process that allows aligning expectations, reducing risks, and moving forward with clarity from day one.

services.title: Services
services.description: Custom solutions for companies and freelance clients, tailored to their needs and objectives.

approach.title: My approach
approach.description: Principles that guide each project to ensure consistent, scalable, and sustainable results over time.

conclusion.title: Building the next chapter
conclusion.text: Every project is an opportunity to learn, innovate, and transform ideas into memorable digital experiences.
conclusion.text2: I'm ready to keep building and growing as a developer.
